üì¢ Update: Cinematic Cut-ins v1.2.2

‚ú® Screen Aspect Settings
- New Default: Changed to Letterbox to ensure consistent composition for all players.
- Split Config: Set screen modes independently for Personal and Group cut-ins.
- Adaptive Stretch: Fill your screen without distortion (available in settings).

üêõ Bug Fixes
- Ghosting Fix: Previous images will no longer overlap on new cut-ins.
- Style Cleanup: Strict CSS background reset during media transitions.

announcement.title: ‚ú® v1.2.2 Update: Screen Modes & Bug Fixes
announcement.content: The default screen mode is now 'Cinema' to keep the GM's composition consistent. You can change this and set independent ratios for Single/Group cut-ins in the settings. The previous image ghosting bug is also fixed!
